name: Topology Diagram
description: Build a topology diagram from nodes, edges, loads and supports.

inputParameters.name: nodes
inputParameters.description: A list of COMPAS CEM nodes to add to the diagram.

inputParameters.name: trail_edges
inputParameters.description: A list of COMPAS CEM trail edges to add to the diagram.

inputParameters.name: deviation_edges
inputParameters.description: A list of COMPAS CEM deviation edges to add to the diagram.

inputParameters.name: loads
inputParameters.description: A list of COMPAS CEM loads to add to the diagram.

inputParameters.name: supports
inputParameters.description: A list of COMPAS CEM supports to add to the diagram.
